titles.title: CURED Act
Jonas Salk Elementary Cap Undo Regulatory Environmental Delay

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to issue a final decision whether or not to issue a permit under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 authorizing construction of an elementary school in San Diego, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
3/22/2012--Introduced. Jonas Salk Elementary Cap Undo Regulatory Environmental Delay or CURED Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to issue a final decision on whether or not to issue a permit under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 authorizing the San Diego Unified School District to construct an elementary school in San Diego, California.
Deems the permit to have been issued if the Secretary does not make a final decision within 90 days of this Act's enactment.
